about_the_game:
Game Description: "Worker Simulator: Cleaning the Abandoned Village"

Embark on a unique experience in "Worker Simulator," where you take on the role of a brave cleaner striving to save an abandoned village from waste and garbage. In rainy weather that adds a special touch to the adventure, you will face real challenges while cleaning the streets and homes.

Game Features:

  • Open World: Explore a vast village filled with amazing details, with breathtaking landscapes revealed under the rain.

  • Varied Missions: Collect waste, reorganize spaces, and tackle challenges that require your cleaning and organizing skills.

  • Dynamic Atmosphere: The changing weather affects the game, with rain adding aesthetic beauty and additional challenges.

  • Interact with the Environment: Use various tools such as brooms, vacuum cleaners, and buckets to bring life back to the village.

  • Continuous Progress: With each cleaning operation, you will see how the village transforms and regains its beauty, giving you a sense of accomplishment.

Are you ready to be the hero of cleanliness?

Start your adventure now, and use your skills to bring life back to the abandoned village, showing the world that hard work and hope can achieve the impossible!

➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​

How to Get Started and What You Need

To begin cleaning the abandoned village, you should follow some basic steps and prepare the necessary tools to achieve your goals efficiently.

Step 1: Preparing for the Task

  • Initial Assessment: Take a tour of the village to identify the most polluted areas and prioritize your work. Take notes on the amounts of waste and their locations.

  • Necessary Repairs: Sometimes, you'll need to repair the power stations to ensure the electrical tools function properly. Make sure you have all the necessary components for repairs, such as wires, switches, and tools.

Step 2: Gathering Tools and Equipment

  • Vacuum Cleaner: After repairing the power station, use the vacuum cleaner to clean small to medium-sized waste. Ensure the vacuum is in good condition and ready for use.

  • Cranes: You will need cranes to lift large debris or heavy objects. Check the availability and functionality of the cranes before starting work.

  • Hand Broom: Get a hand broom for sweeping different types of waste, especially in tight spaces or areas that are hard to reach with larger equipment.

Step 3: Starting Work

  • Organizing the Work: Divide the areas into sectors and start cleaning each area systematically. Use the appropriate tools for each type of waste.

  • Continuous Assessment: After finishing each area, evaluate what has been accomplished and adjust the work plan if necessary.

Conclusion:

Once the village is cleaner, you'll feel proud to see the changes you've made. Enjoy the cleaning process and always be ready to adapt to any challenges you may face!

4o mini

🎮​ Gameplay Features

1- Cleaning the land ​🧑‍🔧​

2- Collect items from the city 🧊​🍶​

3- Driving vehicles 🚖​🚗​

4- Player State 🍹​🍗​❤️​

5- Fast Travel 🎑​

➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​

name: Worker Simulator: The Village

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660 Super or Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
